title: Yuri!!! on Ice: Yuri Plisetsky GPF in Barcelona EX - Welcome to The Madness

alternative_titles.en: Yuri!!! On ICE: Yuri Plisetsky GPF in Barcelona EX "Welcome to The Madness"
alternative_titles.ja: ユーリ!!! on ICE Yuri Plisetsky GPF in Barcelona EX "Welcome to The Madness"

synopsis:
In his exhibition performance for the Grand Prix of Figure Skating Final in Barcelona, 15-year-old Yuri Plisetsky seeks to defy his "Russian Fairy" nickname by showing off wild new choreography, the likes of which have never been seen from him on the ice before.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
